## Spinner

<div>
<RandomGradientBackground className="rounded-lg p-4 w-full h-full rounded-full">
<div className="text-black">
<div className="text-black font-bold text-xl mb-2 mt-8"><code className="!text-black">class</code> Spinner</div>

</div>
